description:
While the marines prepare for Ace`s execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Special Retrospective Before Marineford! The Vow of Brotherhood!
Juste avant Marine Ford ! Les souvenirs de Luffy. La promesse des deux frères.
Marineford Chokuzen Kaisou Special: Kyoudai no Chikai!
حلقة تذكيريّة خاصّة قبل مارينفورد: عهد الإخوة!
海軍本部[マリンフォード]直前回想特別編[スペシャル] 兄弟の誓い!
